about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a web developer from Palermo, Sicily, Italy. I have a master's degree in geology and started developing in 2022. I have began studying computer science driven by a passion for IT and learnt how to create interactive web applications using the latest technologies; I have leveraged 'agile' method in many of my projects.

education.title: Education
education.content: Intensive course to become a full stack web developer. In the first part of the course I studied the necessary basics of web development, learning how to use Html, CSS and Git. The second part focused on JavaScript, FE development through React.Js and BE development with Node.Js; I also gained expertise with TypeScript.
education.content3: Master's degree in geology, University of Palermo.
education.content4: Bachelor's degree in geology, University of Palermo.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: Practical experience working in teams, aimed at developing web applications with 'agile' methodology through HTML, CSS, JS, React and Node.
experience.content2: Outbound teleselling, collecting and recording customer data during phone calls.
experience.content4: Sales activities to individuals and businesses.
